# Robots
Pre-war robots still wander the wastes. Many were built for labor or defense and will attack intruders.
## Protectron Slow but durable security robots armed with weak lasers or claws. Drops scrap electronics and sometimes energy cells when destroyed.
## Mr Handy / Mr Gutsy Hovering utility robots equipped with saws, flamers or plasma guns depending on the model. Can fly over obstacles and attack with 6-8 burn damage.
These machines generally consider all factions hostile unless specifically reprogrammed.
